类 ExtendedUTM

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
reader.ExtendedUTM
所有已实现的接口:
Runnable
直接已知子类:

public class ExtendedUTM extends Thread
The class to control to show Universal Turing Machine.
版本:
0.0.1
作者:
Mingchong Li

  • 方法详细资料

    • run

      public void run()
      Thread function, call by start(). Forever run until the halt. Pause when running is false.
      指定者:
      run 在接口中 Runnable
      覆盖:
      run 在类中 Thread
